member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets a description for the approval of the award to a selected vendor. This is provided by the approver of this request for quotation.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.ORequestForQuotation.MinimumNumberOfQuotationsPolicy
member.summary:
[Column] Gets or sets a value indicating the policy of the system with respect to creating purchase orders from quotations.
0 - A minimum number of quotations is not required.
1 - A minimum number of quotations is preferred. A warning is displayed if the minimum quotations is not satisfied.
2 - A minimum number of quotations is required.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.ORequestForQuotation.MinimumNumberOfQuotations
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the minimum number of quotations required before a Purchase Order can be created from a Request for Quotation. This value must be more than or equals to 1. At the very least, there must be at least 1 quotation in a Request for Quotation before any Purchase Order can be created anyway.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.ORequestForQuotation.MinimumApplicableRFQAmount
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the minimum amount (inclusive) that will result in the minimum quotation policy taking effect.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.ORequestForQuotation.BudgetValidationPolicy
member.summary:
[Column] Gets or sets a value indicating the budget validation policy.
0 - Budget consumption must be equal to line items. (default)
1 - Budget consumption must be less than or equal to line items.
2 - No validation.

member.name: T:LogicLayer.OPurchaseOrder
member.summary: Represents a purchase order object as a legal document to a vendor to purchase materials or services.

member.name: F:LogicLayer.OPurchaseOrder.tempPurchaseBudgetSummaries
member.summary: A cached copy of the budget summary table that can be queried from the database

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OPurchaseOrder.ComputeTempBudgetSummaries
member.summary: Computes the temporary list of budget summaries.

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OPurchaseOrder.SubmitForApproval
member.summary:
Submits for Purchase Order for approval by doing:
1. Creates the budget transaction logs.
2. Creates the budget summaries and stamp them with the current budget available balance.
This method is called from the workflow. It should not be called by the developer directly.

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OPurchaseOrder.Approve
member.summary:
Approves the Purchase Order by doing the following:
1. Update all budget transactions to indicated Approved.
2. Create budget summaries if not already created.
3. Stamp budget summaries with current budget balance at approval.
This method is called from the workflow. It should not be called by the developer directly.

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OPurchaseOrder.Reject
member.summary:
Rejects the Purchase Order by doing the following: 1. Cancels all budget transactions. 2. Clears all budget summaries.
This method is called from the workflow. It should not be called by the developer directly.

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OPurchaseOrder.Cancel
member.summary:
Cancels the Purchase Order by doing the following:
1. Unlink all PO line items from RFQ / PR line items.
2. Cancel all PO budget transactions.
3. Undo the transfer of the previous RFQ budget transactions.
This method is called from the workflow. It should not be called by the developer directly.

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OPurchaseOrder.Close
member.summary:
Closes the Purchase Order by doing the following:
1. Cancels all budget transactions.
This method is called from the workflow. It should not be called by the developer directly.

member.summary: Validates that there is sufficient amount in the budgets for the deduction.
member.returns: Returns a string of a list of budget periods and accounts that are insufficient. Returns an empty string otherwise.

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OPurchaseOrder.ValidateBudgetAmountEqualsLineItemAmount
member.summary:
Validates that the budget amount is equals to the line item amount.
This function is generic and can be applied to any of the PR/RFQ/PO objects provided the line items implement the ItemNumber and the Amount properties.
member.returns: Returns -1 if the validation succeeds. Returns 0 if the total PR amount does not equal the budget amount . Returns any other number if that line number does not equal the budget amount

-1 - if there is insufficient quotations, but a justification is required.

member.summary:

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OEquipmentTypeParameter.IsIncreasingMeter
member.summary:
[Column] Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this parameter is an increasing meter value, or an absolute meter value.
An increasing meter value refers to meters like water consumption meters, power usage meters, where the reading continues to increase over time until it reaches the maximum and restarts over.
A non-increasing meter refers to absolute meters like thermometers.
0 - This is a non-increasing meter, like a thermometer.
1 - This is an increasing meter, like a water/power usage meter.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OEquipmentTypeParameter.ReadingMaximum
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the maximum value that the reading can reach, before rewinding back to zero. This is only applicable if IsIncreasingMeter is 1.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OEquipmentTypeParameter.ReadingMultiplicationFactor
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the factor to be multiplied to the reading to get the true value of the reading.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OEquipmentTypeParameter.IsIncreasingMeterText
member.summary: Gets the localized text that indicates whether this parameter is an increasing meter or not.

member.name: T:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess
member.summary: Represents an approval process specific to a persistent object type and a state within its workflow. This approval process specifies approval hierarchies applicable to the persistent object depending on the location/equipment specified in the persistent object.

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.GetAllApprovalProcesses
member.summary: Returns a list of all active approval processes in the system.

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.GetApprovalProcesses(LogicLayer.LogicLayerPersistentObject)
member.summary: Gets a list of approval process details object by the specified approval process code and applicable to the persistent object.

member.name: M:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.GetApprovalHierarchyLevels(LogicLayer.LogicLayerPersistentObject,System.Collections.Generic.List{LogicLayer.OApprovalHierarchyLevel},System.Nullable{System.Int32}@)
member.summary: Gets the approval hierarclies applicable to the specified persistent object. This table shows the list of approvers that the task represented by the persistent object will be routed to.
member.returns: 0 - Approval is required. 1 - This task will be approved by this user. 2 - There is no approval required (only for when forwarding mode = None) 3 - Approval is required, but no approver is found.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.LocationID
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the foreign key to the Location table that represents the location this approval process applies to.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.EquipmentID
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the foreign key to the Equipment table that represents the equipment this approval process applies to.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.ObjectTypeName
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the type name of the persistent object that this approval process applies to.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.ApprovalProcessID
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the Foreign key to the ApprovalProcess table.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.ModeOfForwarding
member.summary:
[Column] Gets or sets the mode of forwarding for the approval process at this location/equipment.
The mode of forwarding determines how the object will be assigned to the users/roles in the approval hierarchy.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.Description
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the description of this approval process detail.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.ApprovalHierarchyID
member.summary: [Column] Gets or sets the Foreign key to the ApprovalHierarchy table. This is compulsory when the ModeOfApproval = 1

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.ApprovalHierarchy
member.summary: Gets or sets the OApprovalHierarchy object representing the hierarchy of users/roles and their approval limits that will be used for approving objects.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the OLocation object representing the location to which this approval process applies.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.Equipment
member.summary: Gets or sets the OEquipment object representing the equipment to which this approval process applies.

member.name: P:LogicLayer.OApprovalProcess.ModeOfForwardingText
member.summary: Gets the text representing the mode of approval.

member.name: T:LogicLayer.ApprovalModeOfForwarding
member.summary: Enumerates the different modes of approval forwarding.

member.name: F:LogicLayer.ApprovalModeOfForwarding.None
member.summary: This indicates that the task will not be forwarded to any user/role and will be considered approved.

member.name: F:LogicLayer.ApprovalModeOfForwarding.Direct
member.summary: This indicates that the task will be forwarded to the first user/role authorized to approve this task based on its amount.

member.name: F:LogicLayer.ApprovalModeOfForwarding.Hierarchical
member.summary: This indicates that the task will be forwarded in a hierarchical manner from the first user/role in the approval hierarchy to the first user/role authorized to approve the task. Each assigned approver must approve the task before the next approver will be assigned the task for approval.

member.name: F:LogicLayer.ApprovalModeOfForwarding.All
member.summary: This indicates that the task will be forwarded to the users/roles from the first in the hierarchy to the first authorized to approve the task all at once. When an assigned user approves the task, it will be assigned to the all persons/roles from the next level to the first authorized to approve the task.

member.name: T:LogicLayer.ApprovalResult
member.summary: Enumerates a list of approval results returned by the OApprovalProcessDetail.GetApprovalHierarchyLevels.

member.name: F:LogicLayer.ApprovalResult.ApprovalRequired
member.summary: Indicates that approval is required, and the results returned contains the list of the approval hierarchy levels.

member.name: F:LogicLayer.ApprovalResult.Approved
member.summary: Indicates that the task will be approved by the current user.

member.name: F:LogicLayer.ApprovalResult.NoApprovalRequired
member.summary: Indicates that the task does not require any approval.

member.name: F:LogicLayer.ApprovalResult.NoApproversFound
member.summary: Indicates that the task requires approval, but no appropriate approvers are found configured in the approval process.
